channel.title: Blogging Platform on Lubolab

item.title: New setup for this blog: Migration from Ghost to Hugo
item.author: lubomir.kamensky@gmail.com (Lubomir Kamensky)
item.description: World Wild Jungle As I already complained in the post Reporting: Data Lab Web App earlier this year, I am quite confused regarding the actual complexity of web development. The evolution of the web technologies created a brand new world. World Wild virtual jungle. The diversity of species living there is gigantic. It is getting closer to real nature where it is impossible for a man to get detail understanding of all living forms.
